item.description:
Join us for a wonderful evening enjoying the annual free outdoor Shakespeare on the Common. This year's production is All's Well that Ends Well. The show starts at 8pm, but we need to get there early to get a decent spot- it gets very busy! Feel free to bring a blanket or lawn chair. We will get there early and have a picnic, then enjoy the show. Please bring what ever food/drinks that you would like to enjoy.

We are meeting outside the entrance at the Starbuck's on the corner of Bolyston and Tremont (across the street from Boylston Street T Stop). We will then walk down to the Bandstand area in the Common to get our spots to sit for the show. Please meet us at 6:30 so we can all walk over together- it gets very crowded near the Bandstand. If you are running late, please call me at 774 232 0000.

Join us for a fun night- we will probably grab some drinks after the show.
item.how_to_find_us: We are meeting OUTSIDE Starbuck's entrance at the corner of Boylston Street and Tremont St. across from Bolyston St. T Stop.
item.name: Picnic and Shakespeare on the Common
